html: (2 Nephi 16:13)."Yet in it shall be a tenth, and it shall return." This may be symbolic of the Lord's portion a tithe. Only those who will be(desire to be and live accordingly) the Lord's people will return or be gathered in with the redeemed of the Lord. The number of these returnees will be but a fraction ("a tenth") of the original group. (See Amos 5:3.)
